response.overview: The Hangover crew heads to Thailand for Stu's wedding. After the disaster of a bachelor party in Las Vegas last year, Stu is playing it safe with a mellow pre-wedding brunch. However, nothing goes as planned and Bangkok is the perfect setting for another adventure with the rowdy group.
response.title: The Hangover Part II

cast.name: Nirut Sirijanya
cast.original_name: นิรุตติ์ ศิริจรรยา
